events.name: QualityCheckInitiated
events.description: To monitor and evaluate product quality at various stages.

events.name: QualityCheckCompleted
events.description: Indicates the end of a quality check with results.

events.name: QualityIssueReported
events.description: Captures a quality issue found during the checks.

events.name: QualityIssueResolved
events.description: To track the resolution of reported quality issues.

commands.name: InitiateQualityCheck
commands.description: To monitor and evaluate product quality at various stages.

commands.name: CompleteQualityCheck
commands.description: Indicates the end of a quality check with results.

commands.name: ReportQualityIssue
commands.description: Captures a quality issue found during the checks.

commands.name: ResolveQualityIssue
commands.description: To track the resolution of reported quality issues.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to fetch and update inventory data during quality checks.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: To coordinate quality issues that may involve suppliers.

integrationPoints.name: LogisticsManagement
integrationPoints.description: Coordinate with logistics to handle products with quality issues.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingSystem
integrationPoints.description: To generate quality reports for stakeholders.
